mapper.sql: TODO_ID, CASE_ID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ORG, PROC_INST_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, ASSIGN_USER, ASSIGN_ORG, TASK_ACTION_ID, TASK_ACTION_NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CASE_TODO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CASE_TODO (TODO_ID, CASE_ID, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ORG, PROC_INST_ID, PROC_DEF_ID, ASSIGN_USER, ASSIGN_ORG, TASK_ACTION_ID, TASK_ACTION_NAME) values (#{todoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taskActionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taskActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into CASE_TODO
TODO_ID,
CASE_ID,
CREATE_USER,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_ORG,
PROC_INST_ID,
PROC_DEF_ID,
ASSIGN_USER,
ASSIGN_ORG,
TASK_ACTION_ID,
TASK_ACTION_NAME,
#{todoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assignOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{taskActionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{taskActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update CASE_TODO
TODO_ID = #{record.todoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ORG = #{record.createOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROC_INST_ID = #{record.procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_DEF_ID = #{record.procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_USER = #{record.assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_ORG = #{record.assignOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_ACTION_ID = #{record.taskActionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_ACTION_NAME = #{record.taskActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CASE_TODO set TODO_ID = #{record.todoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CASE_ID = #{record.caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ORG = #{record.createOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROC_INST_ID = #{record.procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_DEF_ID = #{record.procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_USER = #{record.assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_ORG = #{record.assignOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASK_ACTION_ID = #{record.taskActionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASK_ACTION_NAME = #{record.taskActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CASE_TODO
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ORG = #{createOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_DEF_ID = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_USER = #{assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_ORG = #{assignOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_ACTION_ID = #{taskActionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASK_ACTION_NAME = #{taskActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TODO_ID = #{todoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CASE_TODO set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ORG = #{createOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_DEF_ID = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_USER = #{assignUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_ORG = #{assignOrg,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASK_ACTION_ID = #{taskActionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASK_ACTION_NAME = #{taskActionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TODO_ID = #{todoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CASE_TODO CT,CASE_BASIC C,ACT_RU_TASK ART,CASE_STATE CS, (select target_task_def_id,t.* from task_action,case_todo t where action_id(+)=t.TASK_ACTION_ID) temp WHERE ART.TASK_DEF_KEY_(+)=temp.target_task_def_id AND ART.proc_inst_id_(+)=temp.PROC_INST_ID AND ART.proc_def_id_(+)= temp.PROC_DEF_ID AND CT.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID and temp.todo_id = ct.todo_id and c.is_turnover = 0 AND ct.ASSIGN_ORG = #{orgCode} AND CS.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID AND CS.LIAN_SUP_STATE IS NULL

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (B.CASE_STATE = 0 or B.CASE_STATE=28) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIAN_NUM, SUM(CASE WHEN B.CASE_STATE = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CHUFA_NUM, SUM(CASE WHEN B.CASE_STATE = 27 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TURNOVER_NUM, SUM(CASE WHEN B.CASE_STATE = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS YISONG_NUM, SUM(CASE WHEN B.CASE_STATE = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BUCHONGDIAOCHA_NUM FROM CASE_TODO T,CASE_BASIC B WHERE T.CASE_ID = B.CASE_ID AND T.ASSIGN_ORG = #{orgCode}

SELECT CB.CASE_ID,TR.TRANSFER_ID,CB.CASE_NO,CB.CASE_NAME,CB.INPUT_TIME,O.ORG_NAME AS CREATE_ORG_NAME,CB.CASE_STATE FROM CASE_TODO CT,TRANSFER_DETENTION TR,CASE_BASIC CB,ORGANISE O WHERE CT.CASE_ID=TR.CASE_ID AND TR.CASE_ID=CB.CASE_ID AND CB.INPUT_UNIT=O.ORG_CODE AND CB.CASE_STATE=30 AND CT.ASSIGN_ORG=#{assignOrg}
AND CB.CASE_NAME LIKE concat(concat('%',#{caseName}),'%')
AND CB.CASE_NO LIKE concat(concat('%',#{caseNo}),'%')
AND CB.INPUT_TIME>=#{startTime}
AND CB.INPUT_TIME < #{endTime}+ interval '1' day
AND O.ORG_PATH LIKE concat(#{orgPath},'%')
ORDER BY CB.INPUT_TIME DESC
